name: Arthur King of Mars
description:
Made for Global Games Jam 2021 in 5 days

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/arthur-flashdragon-8

Hundreds of years ago King Arthur sealed himself away under Britain, waiting to spring forth at its moment of most dire need.... well, that came and went.

Britain has moved to Mars and you wake up a few hundred years too late, your former friends rather disgruntled at this, need you to prove yourself worthy of calling yourself King Arthur. Battle through 3 boss fights to reclaim what you have lost; Excalibur, your Crown and the respect of your closest friend.
